CompanyDescription: The Andersons, Inc. (the "Company") is a diversified company rooted in agriculture. Segment Descriptions The Company's operations are classified into four reportable business segments: Trade, Ethanol, Plant Nutrient, and Rail. Each of these segments is organized based upon the nature of products and services offered. See Note 13 to the Consolidated Financial Statements in Item 8 for information regarding business segments.
